attributes.action: Provide protection to small businesses from late payment of bills by customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small businesses oftern have to stop trading due to cash flow problems caused by the late payment of bills by larger companies. Legislation is required to protect small businesses by forcing companies to pay outstanding invoices on time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
